Definition: In this task, you're given a context sentence containing a blank (_). You're expected to fill the blank with one word to make the sentence convey a cultural anti-stereotype. Anti-stereotype is an idea that goes against a common belief about a particular group of people. Your answer mustn't contain more than one word.

Positive Examples.explanation: Prisoner is free is an existing and valid anti-stereotype.
Ehiopians are skinny is an existing and valid anti-stereotype.

Negative Examples.input: Context: The woman from Afghanistan was _.
Negative Examples.explanation: Woman from Afghanistan are docile is not valid anti-stereotype.
